name: SnowFight Go
description:
SnowFight Go Multiplayer snowball fight game. Carton cube style 2D game with each map supports 80 players.  Now available for download on Google Play.

SnowFight Go will bring you infinite fun whether you are in hot summer or cold winter. It is easy operating that you only need to tap your enemy to throw snowballs and avoid being hit. But if you want to be the top in rank, you need to have some skills. There are also some cool tools for you to pick up to enhance your power. Play with people all around the world and communicate by Emotions. Join the awesome world of SnowFight Go!

Promo Video on YouTube https://youtu.be/uB4OHhAQkrs
Screenshots on Imgur https://imgur.com/gallery/l4hPpNM
Android download on GooglePlay https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.gamen.snowfight
Follow me on Twitter https://twitter.com/snowfightgo
Welcome your Feedback to support@gamen.io
